actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To provide that certain civil defense employees and employees of the Federal Emergency Management Agency may be eligible for certain public safety officers death benefits, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to make an employee of the Federal Emergency Management Agency or civil defense officer eligible for public safety officers' death benefits.

titles.title: To provide that certain civil defense employees and employees of the Federal Emergency Management Agency may be eligible for certain public safety officers death benefits, and for other purposes.
